column13: Answer Explanation
* The word "abstain" means to deliberately avoid an action. "Participate" means to take part in something.
* "Optimistic" refers to a positive outlook. "Pessimistic" reflects a negative or doubtful outlook.
* "Expand" means to increase in size. "Contract" means to become smaller.
* "Accept" means to agree to or receive something. "Reject" means to refuse it.
* "Ubiquitous" means present everywhere. "Rare" means uncommon or infrequent.
* "Ambiguous" means unclear. "Clear" means definite and understandable.
* "Explicit" means clearly stated. "Implicit" means suggested but not directly stated.
* "Coherent" means well-organized. "Disjointed" means lacking order or connection.
* "Meticulous" means very careful. "Negligent" means careless.
* "Humble" means modest. "Arrogant" means overly proud.
* "Fragile" means easily broken. "Sturdy" means strong and durable.
* "Retain" means to keep something. "Release" means to let it go.
* "Vigilant" means alert and cautious. "Careless" means lacking attention.
* "Trivial" means unimportant. "Profound" means deep or significant.
* "Withhold" means to keep back. "Disclose" means to reveal.
* "Abundant" means plentiful. "Scarce" means in short supply.
* "Genuine" means real or authentic. "Fake" means false or imitation.
* "Preserve" means to protect. "Destroy" means to ruin completely.
* "Refined" means polished or cultured. "Crude" means rough or unpolished.
* "Prosperous" means successful and wealthy. "Destitute" means extremely poor.
